tools.title: About
tools.content:
The coloured areas on this map show areas of Crown land where the cutting of firewood is prohibited.

Click on the layers option in the menu to see the legend that indicates the reason for the prohibition for a specific area. Click on each layer to see the description.

Visit the Firewood Permits website to apply for a permit and to find out district specific information for firewood cutting for personal use.

This map is not intended for commercial firewood cutting.

Please ensure you are zoomed into your area of interest as some of layers are not visible when zoomed out.
